text: 1996-97 Hong Kong FA Cup was the 23rd staging of the Hong Kong FA Cup. It was competed by all of the 7 teams from Hong Kong First Division League and Yee Hope from the Second Division. The competition kicked off on 6 May 1997 and finished on 1 June with the final. Instant-Double captured the cup for the first time after beating Sing Tao by golden goal in the final. ==Fixtures and results == Rsssf.com, Hongkong 1996/97 ===Bracket=== ==References== Category:Hong Kong FA Cup Hong Kong Fa Cup Fa Cup
title: 1996–97 Hong Kong FA Cup
